entry.title: Tania is selling enchiladas on February 6th with the Solidarity...
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.

Tania is selling enchiladas on February 6th with the Solidarity Meals program. She arrived to the U.S. when she was just five years old, and through DACA she‚Äôs been able to pursue higher education, work for Denver Public Schools as a family liaison, and have a family of her own. She‚Äôs now applying for her residency, which is an incredibly expensive process, so she‚Äôs selling enchiladas this weekend to help raise money to cover the costs. You can order at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co. Pickup will be in Denver this weekend, and money can be sent via Venmo to @/tania-baez-30. Place in Denver for pick up 1400 N Lafayette St Denver Co 80218 ready 1 pm

entry.title: Sanctuary4All ColoradoSanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.Sanctuary4All is selling burritos this weekend! You can order at...
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All ColoradoSanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.

Sanctuary4All is selling burritos this weekend! You can order at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co Rather than going toward a particular family, the money fr...om burrito sales will go toward an emergency fund that any family can access in a time of need. While the Biden administration has halted deportations for the first 100 days of their administration, ICE can still detain people, and this emergency fund is essential in ensuring that if someone is detained, there‚Äôs money readily available to get them legal representation. The photo is from our recent car rally co-hosted with @co_immigrant @abolishicedenver the American Friends Service Committee & Metro Denver Sanctuary Coalition demanding that the Biden administration take further action to keep families together and provide a pathway to permanent legal status for all 11 million undocumented people living in the U.S.

See More

entry.title: It‚Äôs our last sale of the month! Two families will be working...
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

It‚Äôs our last sale of the month! Two families will be working together to make burritos, and the money will go toward an emergency fund, rather than the families cooking. The growth of this fund is incredibly important to the families who lead Sanctuary4All because it provides security in case anyone is unexpectedly detained and needs money quickly for legal representation. You can order a burrito at solidaritymeals.paperform.co
